ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you (the experienced plane and dragon people) are having problems with them, how do you think we (the young still impressed by watching a sand giant
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Also went to Hate this past weekend too. Only group to break that
> post patch on Innoruuk. We cleared the path to Maestro, which is
> about 6 houses or so and the south patrol, however a bugged spite golem
> prevented further advancement. Apparently this golem had it's pet
> trapped in the NE corner. The golem also blocked the path to clear
> anymore, and when pulled it we got 15 mobs. I played fear and counted
> the Screech messages just to see how many were there. All resisted fear
> too, 15 of them. In the 6 hours we were there, one WAR arms dropped.
> That is unacceptible. But I expected as much from Verant. The planes
> and dragons are a big deathtrap now due to bugs and impossible upgrades.

If you (the experienced plane and dragon people) are having problems
with them, how do you think we (the young still impressed by watching a
sand giant dying people) feel? By the time I get to lvl 47 (My estimate
is July of 2005 now) how impossible will it be? (Not to mention, by
then a lvl 100 Necro's Pet will probably be able to solo Vox). Its
something thats kind of put a damper on some of our adventuring now that
we see no long term furute for our group...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
